message.content:
cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.CE, cs.DC, cs.ETM 

This paper deals with the coordination of a large number of dynamic EVs to provide regulation service, which involves real-time control and optimization. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.SY (Systems and Control), which deals with the analysis, design, and control of complex systems. The paper also proposes a novel algorithm for fair allocation of regulation amount among the EVs, which involves optimization and machine learning techniques. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely category. The paper also considers the limited battery size and degradation cost of EVs, which involves modeling and simulation of physical systems. Therefore, cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science) is another likely category. The paper also deals with the cost of using external energy sources for the aggregator, which involves distributed computing and networking. Therefore, cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is another likely category. Finally, the paper also deals with the energy and transportation sectors, which involves energy and transportation modeling and optimization. Therefore, cs.ETM (Energy and Transportation Modeling) is another likely category.
